casebody.data:
577 A.2d 7 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. Michael ISAACSON. Misc. (Subtitle BV) No. 19,

Sept. Term, 1990.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. July 27, 1990.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the consent to disbarment from the practice of law filed by Michael Isaacson in accordance with Maryland Rule BV12 d 2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 27th day of July, 1990

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that Michael Isaacson be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of Michael Isaacson from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV13, shall certify that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
